LanguageData.RB_F_PDW.label: Rabbie personal rifle
LanguageData.RB_F_PDW.description: An inexpensive short rifle designed by the Rabbitish Empire and fashioned with personal defense features. It uses small, high velocity bullets and offers a compact size that allows for easy carrying at the cost of range and firepower.
LanguageData.RB_F_PDW.tools.0.label: Grip
LanguageData.RB_F_PDW.tools.1.label: Barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_RBPDW.label: RPR bullet
